sourcesContent: import { Box, Button, CardMedia, Divider, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' const AppIntro = () => { return ( WebApp Setup Setup SMTP Go to admin panel yourdomain.com/admin and SMTP config option. Payment options won't work if you enter wrong details here. ⁍ ‣ For support or installation service shoot an email at window.open('mailto:hello@hamidsaifi.com')} style={{ color: 'black', cursor: 'pointer', fontWeight: 'bolder' }} >hello@hamidsaifi.com ) } export default AppIntro
